name: lspsnss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))

stmt.origin: syl3an3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1), wss(csn(c3), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c3, c1), wss(csn(c3), c1))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(csn(c3), c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c3, c1), wss(csn(c3), c1))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(csn(c3), c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))

|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(csn(c3), c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(csn(c3), c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clspn, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c3)), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clspn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1)→(c4 ` { c3 })⊆ c1)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(LSpan ` c0)

comment: The span of the singleton of a subspace member is included in the subspace. ( ~ spansnss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2014.)
